strapiPost.title: FORMAT Festival Releases 2023 Lineup
strapiPost.content:
Back for its second year, FORMAT Festival will bring a dynamic weekend of music, arts, and technology to Bentonville the weekend of Sep 22-24, and the 2023 lineup looks incredible.

  • Soundwaves: Three days and nights of incredible talent will take the stage during the festival featuring a lineup of 54 musical artists, including LCD Soundsystem, Leon Bridges, and Alanis Morissette ðŸ˜±ðŸ« .
  • Artistry: Beyond the stage, festival goers can enjoy stunning visual and performing arts from artists like Kameelah Janan Rasheed, Ragnar Kjartansson X The National, and the Inside Out Project.

Ticket presale begins Thursday, Apr 6, at 10a. Sign up HERE for first access.
